## Key Insights

- **Endless Mode Optimization**: The compression handler achieves ~95% token reduction for archived tool outputs, addressing session limits. However, synchronous implementation causes 110s latency per tool use (Issue #109).
- **Observation System Expansion**: Added 3 new metadata fields (`concept`, `gitBranch`, `decisionCategory`) and expanded observation types from 7 to 20 categorized types across 7 logical groups.
- **Architecture Improvements**: Refactored Settings.tsx into 17 modular files (from 2061 lines) and implemented embedding provider registry system for multi-provider support.
- **Critical Bottlenecks**: Synchronous Endless Mode v7.1 creates significant latency. MikroORM entity relations need refactoring (Issue #267) for proper lazy loading.
- **UI Development**: Added Endless Mode dashboard widget and settings UI, but build warnings indicate CSS/chunk size optimization needs.
